vocabInfos.mediumDef:
A man living at the time of the Patriarchs, only mentioned at Gen.22.24;
son of: Nahor (H5152H) and Reumah (H7208);
brother of: Tebah (H2875), Tahash (H8477) and Maacah (H4601);
half-brother of: Uz (H5780H), Buz (H0938), Kemuel (H7055), Chesed (H3777), Hazo (H2375), Pildash (H6394), Jidlaph (H3044) and Bethuel (H1328A)
§ Gaham = "burning"
a son of Abraham's brother Nahor and his concubine Reumah
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition:
迦含 这个陽性專有名詞在原文的意思是 "燃燒"
"亞伯拉罕的兄弟拿鶴與他的妾流瑪所生的兒子 (創 22:24)
vocabInfos._zh_Definition:
迦含 这个阳性专有名词在原文的意思是 "燃烧"
"亚伯拉罕的兄弟拿鹤与他的妾流玛所生的儿子 (创 22:24)
